thread.section_title: Elevate Styles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Elevate Styles | elevatestyles.com
thread.title: Jacqueline Tiggs
thread.title_full: Elevate Styles reviewed by Jacqueline Tiggs

author: Jacqueline Tiggs
title: Jacqueline Tiggs
text: Shipping is too high, especially when shopping for one item, therefore I often shop/buy at other sites to offset the shipping price along with lower priced wigs. Other than that, the selection on popular wigs:styles/colors seems to dwindle very quickly as site runs out stock. Seems there would be more stock available of wigs/colors that are most popular so that customers are less apt to go to other sites to find them.
